data.name: Nainai’s Recipe
data.detailed_description:
Nainai’s Recipe is a game that captures the cooking feeling in stylized visuals. And a family story about how we lived together in a special way during 2020.

  • Maximum control - No preset ingredient slice texture, no performance-oriented steps, we want you to enjoy cooking a meal from start to finish.
  • Food to a larger food tradition - We curated a stylized kitchen with strong flavor about a Chinese kitchen, including appliances, condiments, and food choices.
  • Bonding moment with Nainai - During this difficult period of time, you will have more chance than ever to talk to your Nainai and know her story!
data.about_the_game:
Nainai’s Recipe is a game that captures the cooking feeling in stylized visuals. And a family story about how we lived together in a special way during 2020.

  • Maximum control - No preset ingredient slice texture, no performance-oriented steps, we want you to enjoy cooking a meal from start to finish.
  • Food to a larger food tradition - We curated a stylized kitchen with strong flavor about a Chinese kitchen, including appliances, condiments, and food choices.
  • Bonding moment with Nainai - During this difficult period of time, you will have more chance than ever to talk to your Nainai and know her story!
data.short_description: Open your fridge, choose the ingredients, examine, chop, seasoning, heat, and taste them. During the lockdown, you start to learn how to cook from your dear grandma.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: i5 3550 / FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660Ti 3GB / R9 270X 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: i5 4570 / Ryzen 7 1700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / RX 480 GB 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 Yosemite
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Core i9
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5500M
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660Ti 3GB / R9 270X 4GB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
